author: Elufimov

comments.body: Hi __@Elufimov__, I'm your friendly neighborhood Microsoft Pull Request Bot (You can call me MSBOT). Thanks for your contribution! This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. Real humans will now evaluate your PR. TTYL, MSBOT;

title: Fix link to macos pkg file in Readme
